content: * please note that this is the ad-free printable pdf version of this pattern you can find the free written pattern on my blog theturtletrunk com and video tutorial on my youtube channel adding another picot pattern to my collection the picot triangle scarf features beautiful and unique textures the size is completely customizable making it great for children and adults use as many or few colors as you d like to me it perfect for you this pattern uses an easy to remember 6 row repeat so you can work on it mindlessly but still create a cozy and elegant crochet triangle scarf make it striped or color block or solid colored the possibilities are endless for this fun crochet wrap pattern difficulty advanced beginner finished size 46 x 22 size can be customized to be any size language pattern in available in english only standard us crochet terms supples needed - approx 520 yards of medium 4 weight yarn i used lion brand yarn color theory - 5 50mm i crochet hook - yarn needle - scissors pattern includes - special stitch instructions with reference photos - link to free + full video tutorial - detailed written instructions
